summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of the Alley in Block Eight (8) of Randell's Addition to the City of Seattle, from East Union Street to East Spring Street and between Thirty-sixth Avenue and Thirty-seventh Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by grading the same, all in accordance with Majority Petition, being File No. 40339; and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
